devdoc.author: Zondax AG
devdoc.details: For more info about the miner actor, please refer to https://lotus.filecoin.io/storage-providers/operate/addresses/
devdoc.title: This library is a proxy to a built-in Miner actor. Calling one of its methods will result in a cross-actor call being performed.

userdoc.notice: During miner initialization, a miner actor is created on the chain, and this actor gives the miner its ID f0.... The miner actor is in charge of collecting all the payments sent to the miner.
